languages.text: {n}После долгих метаний сгорбленная фигура Атилиуса оседает.{/n} "Конечно, конечно вы правы. Я продолжу служить Янусу и протекторату фон Валанциус как и прежде. Клянусь, я сегодня же направлю запрос о предоставлении указов, изданных Империумом за последние пятьдесят лет. Кто знает, кто знает, чего еще мы на Янусе могли упустить..."

traits.locale_text: {n}После долгих метяний сгорбленная фигура Атилиуса оседает.{/n} "Конечно, конечно вы правы. Я продолжу служить Янусу и торговой империи фон Валанциус как и прежде. Клянусь, я сегодня же направлю запрос о предоставлении указов, изданных Империумом за последние пятьдесят лет. Кто знает, кто знает, чего еще мы на Янусе могли упустить..."

languages.text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"
languages.original_text: {n}После долгих метаний сгорбленная фигура Атилиуса оседает.{/n} "Конечно, конечно вы правы. Я продолжу служить Янусу и протекторату фон Валанциус как и прежде. Клянусь, я сегодня же направлю запрос о предоставлении указов, изданных Империумом за последние пятьдесят лет. Кто знает, кто знает, чего еще мы на Янусе могли упустить..."

I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

{n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

{n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

{n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

languages.text: {n}经过好一番搪塞与支支吾吾之后，阿蒂利乌斯驼背的身影垂下了头。{/n}“当然，当然，您说得没错。我将继续像以前一样，为加努斯与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务。另外，我得让我手下的人把过去这五十年来，帝国颁布的所有律法的复印件都弄来。谁知道这些年里，我们加努斯还错过了什么别的东西？”
languages.original_text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

traits.locale_text: {n}经过好一番搪塞与支支吾吾之后，阿蒂利乌斯驼背的身影垂下了头。{/n}“当然，当然，您说得没错。我将继续像以前一样，为加努斯与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务。另外，我得让我手下的人把过去这五十年来，帝国颁布的所有律法的复印件都弄来。谁知道这些年里，我们加努斯还错过了什么别的东西？”

languages.text: {n}Tras muchas evasivas, la postura ya encorvada de Atilius se hunde.{/n} «Claro, por supuesto que tiene razón. Seguiré sirviendo a Janus y al protectorado von Valancius igual que antes. Y hoy mismo enviaré una solicitud para la facilitación de copias de todos los edictos emitidos por el Imperium en los últimos cincuenta años. ¿Quién sabe qué más nos habremos perdido en Janus?».
languages.original_text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras muchas evasivas, la postura ya encorvada de Atilius se hunde.{/n} «Claro, por supuesto que tiene razón. Seguiré sirviendo a Janus y al protectorado von Valancius igual que antes. Y hoy mismo enviaré una solicitud para la facilitación de copias de todos los edictos emitidos por el Imperium en los últimos cincuenta años. ¿Quién sabe qué más nos habremos perdido en Janus?».

languages.text: {n}言い訳を散々してから、アティリウスは丸まった姿勢でうなだれる。{/n}「もちろん、もちろん陛下の仰るとおりです。私はこれまで通り、ヤヌスとフォン・ヴァランシウス朝に尽くし続けます。そして今日中に帝国がこの50年間で布告した法令の写しを求める要請を送るつもりです。ここヤヌスで見逃しているものがあると知るのは私達だけですから」
languages.original_text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

traits.locale_text: {n}言い訳を散々してから、アティリウスは丸まった姿勢でうなだれる。{/n}「もちろん、もちろん陛下の仰るとおりです。私はこれまで通り、ヤヌスとフォン・ヴァランシウス朝に尽くし続けます。そして今日中に帝国がこの50年間で布告した法令の写しを求める要請を送るつもりです。ここヤヌスで見逃しているものがあると知るのは私達だけですから」

languages.text: {n}Nach weiteren Ausflüchten sackt Atilius' gebeugte Gestalt noch mehr in sich zusammen.{/n} "Natürlich, natürlich, Ihr habt recht. Ich werde Janus und dem Protektorat von Valancius weiterhin dienen. Und noch heute fordere ich Kopien der Edikte des Imperiums aus den letzten fünfzig Jahren an. Wer weiß, was wir hier auf Janus sonst noch versäumt haben?"
languages.original_text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach weiteren Ausflüchten sackt Atilius' gebeugte Gestalt noch mehr in sich zusammen.{/n} "Natürlich, natürlich, Ihr habt recht. Ich werde Janus und dem Protektorat von Valancius weiterhin dienen. Und noch heute fordere ich Kopien der Edikte des Imperiums aus den letzten fünfzig Jahren an. Wer weiß, was wir hier auf Janus sonst noch versäumt haben?"

languages.text: {n}Après avoir réfléchi un long moment, le secrétaire au dos voûté finit par répondre :{/n} « Oui, bien sûr, vous avez raison. Je continuerai à servir Janus et le protectorat des von Valancius comme avant. Et aujourd'hui, j'enverrai une demande pour que l'on me fasse parvenir des exemplaires des décrets passés par l'Imperium au cours des cinquante dernières années. Qui sait ce que j'ai manqué d'autre ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir réfléchi un long moment, le secrétaire au dos voûté finit par répondre :{/n} « Oui, bien sûr, vous avez raison. Je continuerai à servir Janus et le protectorat des Von Valancius comme avant. Et aujourd'hui, j'enverrai une demande pour que l'on me fasse parvenir des exemplaires des décrets passés par l'Imperium au cours des cinquante dernières années. Qui sait ce que j'ai manqué d'autre ? »

languages.text: {n}Atilius, dökülen onca dilden sonra koyuveriyor.{/n} "Tabii, tabii haklısınız. Janus'a ve von Valancius hamiliğine eskisi gibi hizmet etmeye devam edeceğim. Bir de bugün İmparatorluk'un son elli yılda çıkardığı fermanların bir kopyasını isteteceğim. Kim bilir Janus'a gelmeyen daha ne havadisler vardır..."
languages.original_text: {n}After lots of prevarication, Atilius's hunched figure sags.{/n} "Of course, of course you are right. I will continue to serve Janus and the von Valancius protectorate as before. And today I will dispatch a request for copies of edicts issued by the Imperium over the last fifty years. Who knows what else we have missed here on Janus?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius, dökülen onca dilden sonra koyuveriyor.{/n} "Tabii, tabii haklısınız. Janus'a ve von Valancius hamiliğine eskisi gibi hizmet etmeye devam edeceğim. Bir de bugün İmparatorluk'un son elli yılda çıkardığı fermanların bir kopyasını isteteceğim. Janus'a gelmeyen kim bilir daha ne havadisler vardır..."
